title: Lia Dàn: Stone of Destiny
description: After Breanna Ban Morna frees her chief but fails to slay her Norse father, Ćroí Dàn joins Erin’s Hero. The Heart of Destiny leads Breanna and her warriors to seek out Lia Dàn while evading the Dreadlord’s pursuit. With the support of her Tuatha Gods and their Druids, Breanna must once more battle Fomorian demons to reach a portal that will take them to the magical land of Tír na nÓg, called Falias by the Tuatha, where the Stone of Destiny lay in the Mother Goddess Danu’s hands.Having acquired the Stone of Destiny, Breanna returns to Erin with a blessing from All-Father to seek the place where she must wield the Tuatha destiny-shaping magic, a place defended by the Dreadlord. While her band of warriors battles the Norsemen, Erin’s Hero uses an invisibility cloak provided by Dagda to bring the magical Triple Dàns to Erin’s Altar, wielding them to remove her father and his ilk from her land, a feat that would warp the Emerald Isle’s fabric of time—and claim Breanna’s soul!
author: James Raquepau
